title: When you are trying to warn top lane of an incoming gank

replies.body:
http://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/32020236/images/1399698714311.gif
Then they die and flame you for not calling ss

Top: "Report mid for not calling MIA"
Mid: "I called it 3 times"
Top: "Spam it next time"
*later*
Mid: *MIA* *MIA*  *MIA*  *MIA*  *MIA*  *MIA* 
Top: "Report mid for spam"
http://gif-finder.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/Steve-Carell-Facepalm.gif
Seeing Micheal Scott makes me shed tears and want to go over the whole show again.

http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-iHNwa-hR-44/VZNx5NVk9FI/AAAAAAAAEc4/amz0GmZc14Q/s320/finale%2BTWSS.jpg

probably the best ''thats what she said'' joke  in all of the 9 seasons.
This feels way to right.Even though i main {{champion:150}} ,this is way too true when i play jg or mid.
I was on both sides of that, as the jungler and the toplaner. You will get blamed more if you are top.

The worst is when your top lane opponent is Shen, and he ults down to bot lane, and your allies flame you for not calling MIA in time.
https://media.giphy.com/media/mHjBdBZuqBvJC/giphy.gif
I have only felt that one sided. I was Shen (full crit btw... Don't ask).

As someone who has gone full crit Lux, all I can say is:
https://67.media.tumblr.com/c3911748cf59e89832a89e72bc19888e/tumblr_o6cjf5iLad1tq4of6o1_500.gif
Let us see who broke the meta more. Went full AD Nunu. Go on.

I cannot best that. You laugh today Fish, but we will see who laughs last! Muhahaha

My lame attempt at a joke.

If it makes you feel better, that build did not work. At all.
http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-oU-h_fRSMHA/VoGFlR650dI/AAAAAAAA2Wc/HRLPM9m0Txg/s1600/KpxJ32P%2B-%2BImgur.gif

Well with my metabreakers I usually have quite a score. If you have LSI:

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/WifkIzUj-bruiser-kassadin

> Erm... Go to EUW! There is Malicious Metal!

Yeah, but NA has Delicious Metal. He is just like Malicious Metal, but with cookies.

http://www.exploringeso.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/05/tumblr_mash0fP60s1rybm7oo1_500.gif
I succumb. To NA! As soon as I can pay for it myself. (15)

You just gotta throw some money at the screen and Rito will make it happen.
http://i.imgur.com/0c8XrOb.gif?Noredirect

Either that or buy it with IP, which is the probably the wiser choice. Unfortunately though I am out of room in my club, so I can't invite you if you should choose to join NA. I really should make a second club lol
Isn't region switch RP only?
Glitch-outofthreadbounds-nolongertalkingaboutmemesandgames-Glitch-shuttingdown....................

Not bad

http://gifrific.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/12/John-Cena-Not-Bad.gif
Wonder what my ping would be if I switched to NA?

Don't worry about the ping. 
http://i.imgur.com/7bBZ3vg.gif?Noredirect
I expected Shia. I am dissapointed.

What are you going to do about it.

http://img2.hungertv.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/11/shia-allmymovies_0.gif

Adc {{champion:7}}

(1-0 so far)
Erm... Go to EUW! There is Malicious Metal!
I still play Cho'Gath. Take that, meta!

Please, cho gath is 1.4% pick rate
Mordekaiser is .36%

Odd...i see Morde alot....

oh wait...
Yikes. Whenever I see a Cho'Gath it is me, so I am truly surprised.
i play both {{champion:83}} and {{champion:6}} , top that one
I play Omen.
http://i1.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/001/034/391/0b9.gif
{{champion:83}} Or can you?
That seems pretty meta to me

Ap lee sin
{{item:3146}} {{item:3157}} {{item:3285}} {{item:3116}} {{item:1001}} 
ended the game 11/8/20
(yes it was one for all but still...)
was going to finish {{item:3152}} or {{item:3100}} but the game ended

Did someone say AD Lux?

http://i.imgur.com/Ic3IMHm.jpg[/img]

Yes, I repost this at the slightest provocation shutup.
Lightning Shen?
{{champion:98}} If light travels so fast, how come I've never bought it?

It feels even worse when you're playing {{champion:75}} and have no way of stopping the channels, so he just ults right in front of your face and you can't do shit but watch him leave to snowball the map.

I hate it more when they ping SS after he's already done his stuff bot lane. Just like I hate it when Soraka's use their ultimate after you die. It's like they're reminding you they could have done/said something, but didn't. It's not objectively worse, but it pains me more.

I've even had it when I'm premade with the top/other members of the team and Shen starts teleporting to save/assist his ally bot lane. I'm talking with my bot lane like "Shen's incoming!" or whatever (like you do in fights) and then 30 seconds later our premade-in-voice-chat-top-lane says "Shen's missing btw"...
https://media.giphy.com/media/Qfgz1eWAvPSo0/giphy.gif
But that feeling when top lane get a double kill from both of them

*Enemy mid laner comes*

*Mid lane pings "!" a million times when enemy mid laner already at top*

*Dies*

*"?"*
I love this short - "Paperman" - it's really fantastic!
xD

*{{champion:24}} and {{champion:64}} are low after forcing an enemy to back*

*ping ?*

*ping ?*

*ping ?*

*{{champion:105}} Double Kill!*
yup
